column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We came here around 6-7pm and the place was so busy. The ambiance was okay. A little too dark for my taste. The music was okay too. The place downstairs was a bit louder than the ones upstairs so if you want to hear the conversations around your group
column2: better if you reserve seats at the 1st level but their downstairs looks cozy enough.
